import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { logoutUser } from "../../actions/authActions" import { serverInfo } from "../../actions/serverInfo" import { GET_SERVER_ERRORS } from "../../actions/types" import Server from './components/Server' import Status from './components/Status' import Connect from './components/Connect' import Players from './components/Players' import Software from './components/Software' import Share from './components/Share' class Dashboard extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: "Unknown", status: "Unknown", address: "Unknown", port: "Unknown", onlinePlayers: "Unknown", maxPlayers: "Unknown", gamemode: "Unknown", difficulty: "Unknown", seed: "Unknown", software: "Unknown", version: "Unknown" } } onLogoutClick = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.logoutUser() } onProfileClick = e => { e.preventDefault() alert('Profile Click') } componentDidMount() { console.log() } render() { const { user } = this.props.auth return (

Bedrock Server Controls

) } } Dashboard.propTypes = { logoutUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, serverInfo: PropTypes.func.isRequired, errors: PropTypes.object.isRequired } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth: state.auth, errors: state.errors }) export default connect( mapStateToProps, { logoutUser }, { serverInfo } )(Dashboard)
